title: System.MissingMethodException: Constructor on type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.Internal.NullableClassCurrentProviderValueComparer [again]
body:
I was trying to validate fix for https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/issues/32411 in my wider application, however this same problem appears again. I was able to tweak the prevous example to trigger the bug.

### Include your code
[efbug.tar.gz](https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/files/15285969/efbug.tar.gz)

### Include stack traces

### Include provider and version information

Database provider: sqlite
Target framework: .NET Core 8
Operating system: Windows 11
IDE: Visual Studio Code
